title: Belgium: Males, age-specific and age-standardised incidence rates of cancer, by primary site in 2008 (n/100,000 person years)
description: The Belgian Cancer Registry publishes figures related to cancer incidence, mortality and survival rates. The annual figures are available in table form. The tables contain the incidence figures per tumour localisation and gender. Separate tables are available for Belgium, the Flemish Region, the Walloon Region and the Brussels-Capital Region.
